abstract: Siaka Tiéné (born 22 February 1982) is an Ivorian footballer who currently plays as a left back and also play as a holding midfielder or winger for Ligue 1 club Montpellier HSC.
comment: Siaka Tiéné (born 22 February 1982) is an Ivorian footballer who currently plays as a left back and also play as a holding midfielder or winger for Ligue 1 club Montpellier HSC.
